synchro.description: For downloading information, mobile data are used automaticaly, if any option below is cheched. The options uses different amount of data.

common.ENTER_SMS_CODE: Please enter the code we sent you in SMS to log in!
common.ONLY_NUMBERS: You can use only number characters (0-9) here
common.NOT_AVAILABLE: We are sorry, this function is not available, yet

ALREADY_SENT.subtitle: You must wait ~2 minutes before you try it again.
ALREADY_SENT.title: Too much login attempts.

INVALID.subtitle: Please check the provided representative ID and phone number.
INVALID.title: Invalid login credentials!

INVALID_CLIENTID.subtitle: The server can't recognize the client program
INVALID_CLIENTID.title: Wrong client

INVALID_CODE.subtitle: The verification code you provided is invalid, please check the digits.
INVALID_CODE.title: Invalid verification code

NO_INTERNET.subtitle: Please connect to a WiFi access point, or enable your data connection.
NO_INTERNET.title: No internet connection

OLD_CODE.subtitle: Please try again from the first step.
OLD_CODE.title: Old verification code

hash_difference.text: There is a version from the table of charges where the hash differs from the one you already downloaded. Would you like to update?
hash_difference.title: TOC update

update_available.text: There is a newer version from the table of charges, would you like to update?
update_available.title: TOC update
